channel.title: Help with my 06 compiler
channel.description:
Heres the error. [code]Error: Could not find or load main class src\server\event\*.java Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
and heres my compiler. @echo off [code]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_06\bin\java.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -cp bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause[/code]
I'm just getting back into RSPS and this is the only server i've had touble compiling. I'm just trying to learn, so dont flame please. Thank you.

item.title: Help with my 06 compiler
item.dc:creator: @marc110 marc110
item.description:
@marc110 wrote:

[quote="~Halloween~, post:5, topic:514552"]i cant run this with netbeans? i already have netbeans on my comp, i just dont know how to really use it

edit: its the source btw. i can get the client to compile fine[/quote]

mine doesn’t work with netbeans only the link above , try that its worth a try , i can also compile the client with it

item.title: Help with my 06 compiler
item.dc:creator: @marc110 marc110
item.description:
@marc110 wrote:

[quote="~Halloween~, post:1, topic:514552"]Heres the error.

Error: Could not find or load main class src\server\event\*.java Press any key to continue . . .

and heres my compiler.
@echo off

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_06\bin\java.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -cp bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause

I’m just getting back into RSPS and this is the only server i’ve had touble compiling. I’m just trying to learn, so dont flame please. Thank you.[/quote]

download this to compile

http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/eclipse-ide-java-ee-developers/junosr2

Read full topic
